dct_title_s: Greece : Map of Athens / Under-Secretariat of State for the Press and Tourism.
dct_description_sm: Recto: Map of Athens. Relief shown by contour lines. North is oriented towards upper left of map. Verso: Map of Attica. Relief shown by gradient tints and spot heights. Legend on recto shows railway stations, public squares, ancient monuments, museums, churches, public buildings, archaeological institutes, gardens and walks, hotels. Legend on verso shows railways, principal roads, secondary roads; natural features; tourist sites including churches and ancient ruins. "Printed in Greece No. 121--50000--3.40." Back cover includes tourist information: "Excursions in Attica."
dct_publisher_sm: Athēnai : Published by the Under-Secretariat of State for the Press and Tourism, 1940.
